thread.title: Dr. Punker

author: Dr. Punker
title: Dr. Punker
text: Biblio provides a great service linking you with booksellers if you're looking for a used book. Some of these booksellers are independent shops but others appear corporate. The book condition rating system that Biblio makes its sellers use has been accurate so far and I've purchased tens of books from Biblio sellers in the US and located internationally. Great resource for the bibliophile.
